Texts.Chs: 对于鼠族人来说，一张数据光盘就是一笔财富，任何人只要掌握了可以获得大量数据的信息(如存储空间、数据中心或欧米茄服务器，这取决于你问谁) ，就可以得到超乎想象的财富补偿...只要有关的鼠族人足够富有，可以做到这一点。
Texts.Eng: A single data-disc is worth a fortune to a Kirhos, and anyone with information leading to their large collections of data (known as Storage Bays, Data-Centers or Omega Servers depending on who you ask) will be compensated with wealth beyond imagining...provided the Kirhos in question is wealthy enough to accomplish this.

Texts.Chs: 在鼠族人的传统意义上，除了信息之外，很少有东西是“神圣的”。 对于任何鼠族人来说，最有价值的东西就是属于他们的人民在很久以前的任何数据。这些都是异常罕见的，偶尔从散布整个太空光盘和硬盘驱动器种能发现到。
Texts.Eng: Few things are 'sacred' to the Kirhos in the traditional sense, save for information. The most valuable thing to any Kirhos is any data that belonged to their people in ages long past. These are exceptionally rare, occasionally found on discs and hard-drives scattered throughout space.
